response:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Pets API
  description: A simple API to manage pets.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3000
paths:
  /api/pets:
    get:
      summary: Get all pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of pets
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: integer
                    name:
                      type: string
                    type:
                      type: string
    post:
      summary: Add a new pet
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                type:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The created pet
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
  /api/pets/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The pet with the specified ID
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
    put:
      summary: Update a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                type:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The updated pet
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
    delete:
      summary: Delete a pet by ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The deleted pet
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  type:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Pet not found

response:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Flask RESTful API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Get Hello Message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: hello world
    post:
      summary: Create Data
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              description: JSON object sent in the request body
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Data created successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
                    description: Echoed back data from the request
  /square/{num}:
    get:
      summary: Get Square of a Number
      parameters:
        - name: num
          in: path
          required: true
          description: An integer to calculate the square of
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  square:
                    type: integer
                    example: 16

response:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Weather Forecast API
  description: An API to get weather forecasts.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /WeatherForecast:
    get:
      operationId: GetWeatherForecast
      summary: Get a list of weather forecasts
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of weather forecasts
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    date:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: The date of the forecast
                    temperatureC:
                      type: integer
                      description: The temperature in Celsius
                    summary:
                      type: string
                      description: The summary of the weather
      tags:
        - Weather Forecast

response:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Weather Forecast API
  description: API for retrieving weather forecast data.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /WeatherForecast:
    get:
      operationId: GetWeatherForecast
      summary: Retrieves a list of weather forecasts.
      tags:
        - WeatherForecast
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of weather forecasts.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/WeatherForecast'
components:
  schemas:
    WeatherForecast:
      type: object
      properties:
        date:
          type: string
          format: date
          description: The date of the weather forecast.
        temperatureC:
          type: integer
          description: The temperature in Celsius.
        summary:
          type: string
          description: A summary of the weather conditions.
      required:
        - date
        - temperatureC
        - summary
